episodes.title: I Was Raised In A Satanic Cult | Surviving Hell with Kibbi Linga
episodes.description:
Kibbi was born into a satanic cult led by her mother. Her family hid behind the cover of religion and would use inversions of religion as an excuse to perpetuate abuse. As a child she says she was forced to watch and partake in human sacrifices, as well as incest. Kibbi told herself as a child that she would one day get away, be an artist, and expose her mother - and after years of being silenced, that is exactly what she is doing. Listener discretion is advised and this episode is not suitable for children.
